data.what_is:
Marigold Engage (formerly known as Selligent) provides a flexible, multichannel marketing platform to enterprise organizations in retail, travel & hospitality, media & publishing, and financial services. Our robust and customizable tool can be configured to fit exact requirements and slot neatly into existing martech ecosystems. 

We offer local and regional support and insight across Europe, providing a collaborative approach to building your ideal marketing solution. Working with your teams wherever they are - the power of an enterprise solution with the support of a local business.
data.product_description: Marigold Engage omnichannel audience engagement platformUnlike the patchwork quilt of separately developed technologies common to the giant marketing clouds, Selligent Marketing Cloud's natively integrated platform offers an efficient and cohesive solution for today's consumer-first marketer. With data and execution working as one system, there is no lag between a consumer action and your ability to respond with relevance. As soon as the data changes, so does the consumer experience your brand provides. From real-time tracking and targeting to in-depth analysis and automated messaging, Selligent Marketing Cloud makes it easy for you to connect with your consumers on a true, 1-to-1 level.

features.name: Data Import & Export Tools
features.content: Ability to input, modify and extract data from the application in bulk through a structured file.

features.name: Integration APIs
features.content: Application Programming Interface - Specification for how the application communicates with other software.  API's typically enable integration of data, logic, objects, etc with other software applications.

features.name: Breadth of Partner Applications
features.content: To what extent are there partner applications readily available for integrating into this product?  Partner applications typically provide complementary, best of breed functionality not offered natively in this product.

features.name: Customization
features.content: System provides sufficient customization to meet business requirements

features.name: Workflow Capability
features.content: Automates a process that requires a series of steps that typically require intervention by a several different users.  Administrators can write rules to determine who and when a user needs to complete a step.  Also includes notification of users when they need to take action.

features.name: User, Role, and Access Management
features.content: Based on 10 Marigold Engage reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Grant access to select data, features, objects, etc. based on the users, user role, groups, etc.

features.name: Internationalization
features.content: Enables users to view and transact business with the same content in multiple languages and currencies.

features.name: Sandbox / Test Environments
features.content: Allows administrators to easily develop and test changes to the CRM deployment.  After changes are made admins can easily migrate the changes into the "live" or "production" environment.

features.name: Performance and Reliability
features.content: Software is consistently available (uptime) and allows users to complete tasks quickly because they are not waiting for the software to respond to an action they took.

features.name: Output Document Generation
features.content: Allows adminstrators to create templates that enable users to quickly generate dynamic documents in various formats based on the data stored in the application.

features.name: Building and Personalizing Emails
features.content: Based on 23 Marigold Engage reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Create and design emails with an editor; manage templates; personalize dynamically

features.name: Sending Outbound Emails
features.content: Based on 23 Marigold Engage reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Create targeted lists, schedule and manage bulk email sending.

features.name: Manage Email Deliverability
features.content: Based on 23 Marigold Engage reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Ensure inbox delivery. Includes opt-in management, bounce handling, unsubscribe processing, suppression lists, email preview, spam checking, link validation, and delivery monitoring.

features.name: Automated Email Responses
features.content: Based on 15 Marigold Engage reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Set up automated nurturing emails based on events, online activities, and lead scores

features.name: Landing Pages and Forms
features.content: Based on 10 Marigold Engage reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Build customized landing pages and lead capture forms for specific marketing campaigns to maximize conversion and to capture the right qualifying information.

features.name: Dynamic Content
features.content: Based on 19 Marigold Engage reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Dynamically customize emails, forms, and landing pages for specific segments of customers and prospects.

features.name: A/B Testing
features.content: Based on 21 Marigold Engage reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Test alternate versions of emails, landing pages, and forms. Learn what works, maximize response rates, and increase conversion.

features.name: Mobile Optimized
features.content: Based on 16 Marigold Engage reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Support mobile-optimized emails, online forms, and landing pages.

features.name: Search Tracking and Optimization
features.content: Based on 10 Marigold Engage reviews. Track performance of keywords and links in major search engines.  Measure search rankings and performance.  Improve page-level SEO with tools to diagnose and improve page performance.  Integrate with Google AdWords.

features.name: Marketing Lead Database
features.content: A marketing lead database is the system of record for your most important marketing asset: your leads and contacts. Includes a view of all marketing interactions between each prospect and your company, including website visits, email clicks, scoring changes, and data updates/history.

features.name: Data Quality Management
features.content: Based on 13 Marigold Engage reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Data quality consists of deduplication, cleansing, and appending your marketing database.

features.name: Segmentation
features.content: Based on 18 Marigold Engage reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Segment your database and build list of target leads and contacts.  Filter on demographic and company attributes (title, company size, location) as well as behavioral filters and CRM information.

features.name: Lead Scoring and Grading
features.content: Automatically qualify and score leads based on demographics as well as prospect online behaviors, including recency and frequency. Assign your own weights to determine lead scores for prioritization.

features.name: Lead Nurturing
features.content: Automate drip marketing campaigns that send relevant messages over time, based on prospect behaviors and pre-defined campaign steps.

features.name: Online Behavior Tracking
features.content: Track which emails a prospect opens and clicks, what web-pages they visit, what keywords they use, even what they say on social networks.

features.name: Automated Alerts and Tasks
features.content: Based on 12 Marigold Engage reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Create tasks automatically and provide real-time sales alerts over email, RSS or mobile device.

features.name: CRM Lead Integration
features.content: Sync lead, contact, account, and opportunity information with your CRM system.

features.name: Program ManagementView full feature definition
features.content: Based on 13 Marigold Engage reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Manage marketing campaigns and programs across multiple channels, including online ads, video campaigns, mobile, virtual events, and social media. Create and optimize program assets such as landing pages, emails, campaigns, and lists. Track program objectives, results, and costs to assess the program ROI.

features.name: Event / Webinar Marketing
features.content: Streamline the entire event process, including personalized invitations, registration, reminders, and post-event follow-up.  Integrate with online meeting tools like WebEx, Adobe Connect, GoToWebinar.

features.name: Calendaring
features.content: Maintain a marketing calendar across multiple groups. Manage the calendar for the entire marketing department, from promotions to content to PR.

features.name: Budgeting
features.content: Manage all aspects of marketing investments, including assigning top-down budgets to various groups and divisions, planning marketing spending across programs, tracking open-to-spend, ensuring budget compliance, coordinating work-flows and permissions, and reconciling plans with actual invoices.

features.name: Social Listening
features.content: Monitor what leads and contacts say on sites such as Facebook, Twitter, YouTube, LinkedIn, blogs, and online communities.  Incorporate into your lead and customer DB and use social insights to segment prospects.  Trigger campaigns, and update lead scores.

features.name: Social Sharing
features.content: Add intelligent social share buttons to your campaigns and content.  Track who is sharing your content and driving conversions.

features.name: Social Campaigns
features.content: Schedule automated posts to one or more social accounts; use or integrate with URL shortening services; and measure likes, comments, replies, and retweets.

features.name: Social Media Engagement
features.content: Social apps including polls, sweepstakes, and referral programs can enhance audience engagement.  Include these on your website, landing pages, Facebook pages, and emails.

features.name: Social Media Advertising
features.content: Amplify brand and community stories; Reach customers by social profile and activity; Optimize social ad campaigns in real-time

features.name: Basic Reporting
features.content: Based on 23 Marigold Engage reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Access pre-built and custom reports and dashboards to measure leads by source/campaign/month, email performance, landing page performance, and web and social activity. Create report subscriptions that can automatically send updates to your team and executives.

features.name: Web Analytics
features.content: Based on 11 Marigold Engage reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Track which pages prospects and customers visit and how often they come back.  Capture the history in database for lead scoring and sales intelligence. Use anonymous company look-up to identify anonymous visitors.  Send alerts to sales reps of which of their prospects and customers web activity.

features.name: ROI Analytics
features.content: Measure leads, prospects generated, pipeline, revenue, investment, and ROI by marketing channel or program. The result is that you can see which marketing investments are generating the greatest return and get visibility into how marketing budget should be allocated going forward.

features.name: Revenue Analytics
features.content: Analyze how leads flow through the funnel by measuring stage to stage conversion rates and velocity.  Allocate pipeline and revenue credit among all the marketing activities that have successfully touched an opportunity as it moves through the pipeline.

features.name: SEO / Keyword Analytics
features.content: Monitor and track how you rank for relevant keywords on major search engines and compare your overall performance to competitors.

features.name: ROI Tracking
features.content: Helps marketers measure return on investment (ROI) by analyzing campaign effectiveness against costs

features.name: Data Collection
features.content: Gathers data about the effectiveness, impact, and reach of marketing campaigns

features.name: Customer Insights
features.content: Collects and reports on data relating to customer journeys, preferences, and history

features.name: Multi-User Access
features.content: Allows multiple users access to a unified, transparent overview of analytics, dashboards, and campaign results

features.name: Spend Management
features.content: Includes features for budgeting, forecasting, and managing marketing investments

features.name: White Label
features.content: Offers a white labeling service for agencies or resellers to customize platform branding

features.name: Campaign Insights
features.content: Analyzes historical and current marketing campaigns to inform future strategy

features.name: Reports and Dashboards
features.content: Creates reports and dashboards to analyze results of campaigns

features.name: Campaign Stickiness
features.content: Identifies which marketing campaigns resolved in open or closed opportunities

features.name: Multichannel Tracking
features.content: Collects marketing campaign performance data across multiple channels

features.name: Brand Optimization
features.content: Provides opportunities for brands and businesses to fix or modify existing or future campaigns via feedback

features.name: Predictive Analytics
features.content: Uses artificial intelligence (AI) to predict campaign outcomes and suggest actions for optimization

features.name: Data Enrichment
features.content: Uses external data sources to improve customer profiles.

features.name: Expandability
features.content: Can be updated to accept new sources and types of data.

features.name: Multiple Devices
features.content: Can engage with customers across any device with a consistent message.

features.name: Marketing Metrics
features.content: Provides analysis of marketing program ROI and efficiency.

features.name: Predictive Modeling
features.content: Predicts outcomes based on statistical models; can give insight to "what-if" scenarios.

features.name: Recommendation Engine
features.content: Uses artificial intelligence to provide suggestions based on desired outcomes.

initial_reviews.review_title: Selligent Marketing Cloud has helped My business to save time when sending more marketing messages
initial_reviews.review_content:

Selligent Marketing Cloud allows my businessto create and manage campaigns across multiple channels, including email, mobile, social media, and web. And this  gives the company more  income channels

What do you dislike about Marigold Engage?
While Selligent Marketing Cloud offers a range of customization options, it is as flexible as some other marketing automation solutions ,and this  limit the ability of my business to create more unique and highly customized campaigns.

What problems is Marigold Engage solving and how is that benefiting you?
Selligent Marketing Cloud  provides powerful reporting and analytics features that enable my business to track the success of our campaigns and make data-driven decisions about future marketing efforts. initial_reviews.review_title: A remote access strategy for the effective management of our marketing team
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Marigold Engage?
Now we can manage our marketing campaigns from the cloud access, in addition to the fact that it is possible to share with third parties and clients the results and progress of each of the campaigns as well as share information in real time that facilitate the creative process and flow of the information, the costs associated with the deployment have been reduced because under this new situation of remote work we were able to achieve a decrease in administrative costs and a considerable improvement in productivity per employee

What do you dislike about Marigold Engage?
I consider that access is a bit vulnerable and that security is an aspect in which it can be improved a lot, access is only protected with a username and password, something that may be susceptible in the future and cause loss of information, in addition to improving the stability of the platform because sometimes it suffers infrequent crashes but that delay our processes of creation and assignment of campaigns

initial_reviews.review_title: Great Customer Service and Features, but Outdated Message Studio UI
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Marigold Engage?
My organization has been using Selligent's Marketing Cloud services for many years now. We rely on Message Studio to deploy most of our batch and transaction email campaigns. The customer service is great. All users have access to knowledgeable and responsive support through email or phone.

Message Studio also offers unlimited custom email fields unlike some competitors (Twilio Sendgrid).

What do you dislike about Marigold Engage?
The user interface has not been significantly updated in many years. We've also experienced  intermittent issues accessing certain pages and logging into our account.

What problems is Marigold Engage solving and how is that benefiting you?
While we use other enterprise solutions to manage some of our larger volume marketing campaigns, Selligent has been a reliable tool for smaller volume targeted marketing campaigns and their API has enhanced the capabilities of our homegrown CRM.

initial_reviews.review_title: Selligent is a cross channel marketing campaign management solution.
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Marigold Engage?
Selligent is a well maintained multichannel tool that provides ideal services for managing marketing campaigns. It tracks online performance, display review sites, provide customizable features, social channels, consulting partnerships and segmentation. Reporting keeps a track of marketing performance, customer, purchase, sales and products by the company which allows ease of approaching the data in a single view. Reporting is very easy to navigate and detailed. Segmentation is also a quality feature. It has great A/B features for email marketing and supports bulk emails efficiently. Message Studio provides very extensive marketing solutions. API platform is a great feature which helps to connect different sevices and other partners. It offers a great platform to connect with customers. Automation really reduces the workload and strengthen the productivity of the company. The customer service is also very quick and responsive. It provides easy scheduling and reusable templates. System is really flexible, relaiable and extremely collaborative. There is no need of any extensive training, its easy to navigate through.

What do you dislike about Marigold Engage?
User interface can be more friendlier. Sometimes it crashes suddenly, needs a good internet connection. Dynamic content takes a lot of time and effort as compare to other competitors in market. There are some functionality limitations in drag and drop features and system also slows down when doing multiple tasks at once. Some features are also a bit difficult to operate.

What problems is Marigold Engage solving and how is that benefiting you?
Selligent is best to use in any kind of large companies. It provides the best channel for email marketing as it can manage large volumes of mails very efficiently. It has very good performance, improves business process outcomes and is also cost effective.

initial_reviews.review_title: Selligent Marketing Cloud is a life cycle management software which have best data management.
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Marigold Engage?
Selligent Marketing Cloud is used for retail, entertainment, travel, finance and many other big industries. It is used for client life cycle management and is one of the best softwares of its kind that I have seen. The features are customizable and the implementation requires some time but after learning it the whole process becomes smooth. It streamlines the marketing emails and the templates can be created without any hassle. Their professional support team is also one of the reason that we keep using it. Social marketing and Segmentation are its one of my favorite features. The Message Studio got connect to our own CRM within no time. It helps us to send numberless email within a short amount of time. the interface is also very smooth working.

What do you dislike about Marigold Engage?
When using Selligent Marketing Cloud offline the system crashes which can result in loss of data. There is need of drag and drop editor and the system doesn't work the same for Mac users. I hope they introduce both web and browser in the future because currently it is only on desktop. The reporting feature could be better it is not exactly according to my need right now. It is difficult to set up.

What problems is Marigold Engage solving and how is that benefiting you?
Selligent Marketing Cloud contains such a system that it will make your customer loyal and increases your profit by its innovative features. I strongly suggest using Selligent Marketing Cloud to everyone.

initial_reviews.review_title: Efficient and Reliable Service Platform
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Marigold Engage?
I love that Message Studio can connect to our Salesforce CRM quite easily. The results are reliable and we can send thousands of emails in seconds!
We received a great walk through when we started to use the platform and the Selligent team has been a great support for our projects; they are always willing to collaborate when we need it and help us find new strategies. Selligent offers competitive cost options and adaptable to the budgets of medium and large companies.

What do you dislike about Marigold Engage?
Creating templates from scratch can be a little difficult. We decided to work them separately and only copy the code to the platform.

Recommendations to others considering Marigold Engage:
We are currently using Message Studio, we highly recommend it as a reliable platform for email campaigns.

What problems is Marigold Engage solving and how is that benefiting you?
We have automated the process of sending emails to our customers through a secure, stable and user-friendly platform. We use Message Studio at a regional level (Central America) for multiple processes, allowing us to measure the impact of our campaigns and communication with customers immediately.

initial_reviews.review_title: Best-in-Class Email Tool!
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Marigold Engage?
The user-friendly interface helps my team's day-to-day go smoothly. The smart technology allows us to make next-level decisions for audience segmenting and personalization.

What do you dislike about Marigold Engage?
One thing that can be challenging is the limitation with dynamic reporting. When an email is truly dynamic and has several content blocks to support different audience types, we are limited on how much we can drill down into the engagement of each unique send. On the other hand, we have fantastic support from our client relationship manager and technical project managers who always take our feedback to the product team to continue enhancing the capabilities for their users.

What problems is Marigold Engage solving and how is that benefiting you?
Personalization vs. plain old segmentation - this is a problem we are faced with daily. How do we truly personalize on a 1:1 level as opposed to just segmenting by category preference? With the journeys feature and Site, we are able to develop more relevant experiences with true personalization. For example, the ability to capture site behavior in real-time while the person is still shopping. When you have the ability to do this, you can trigger a personalized message either on site or via email with a promotion on that very product the customer was browsing!

initial_reviews.review_title: Powerful Email Marketing platform and Great support team
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Marigold Engage?
User interface - Login process is easy. setting up user profiles is very simple on the UI.
Sub organization set up process is simple and well maintained security between organizations.
Email marketing features : Awesome A/B features, dynamic content features
Builk emails - Support large volume emails.
Transaction emails - Support real time trigger emails
Data Integration - Support file imports and direct database connection.
Reports - I like heat map and domain based campaign performance reports
Email editor - Easy to set up simple templates in Selligent for users who dont know HTML coding.
Log files - In case you want to import data back to your in house system then team provides all the logs in details.
Support process - Very experienced and knowledgeable support team and always available for help.
Never had any issues with support team.
Account manager - Always available to help with our account.
LCM - For creating life cycle marketing features based on the customer transactions.
Training - Your marketing agency do not require extensive training. The UI is very simple and easy to learn for any user.

What do you dislike about Marigold Engage?
Segmentation - Limited features for creating complex segment. Examples - If I want to exclude domains that are marked as Invalid in my previous campaign then new records with that domains should be excluded from future campaigns.
Marketing Features - You have to purchase additional license not integrated with enterprise license.
Email preview - It does show email preview and easy to send test emails. But does not have features to see preview based on the devices and browsers. You need to get additional tool.
Ad-hoc reporting - User should have some knowledge on the SQL to build ad-hoc reports.

What problems is Marigold Engage solving and how is that benefiting you?
We feel Selligent is best tool for your email marketing and our previous system we used to encounter issue when we try to launch large volume email campaigns. Delivery rate is depends upon cleansed customer list. If you try to use purchase list then you will end up in delivery issues.
We like A/B testing features in the tool and Template editor.

initial_reviews.review_title: Great, feature-rich marketing automation platform with responsive support
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Marigold Engage?
Selligent's user interface for data import and segmentation make it extremely easy for a marketer or technical person to interact with the system. Also - it's consistent across all modules in the Marketing Cloud. A lot of their competitors' feel like a patchwork of different software pieces.

The implementation team and support have are head and shoulders above what we were used to with our old vendor. If we have an issue, they are quick to address it and clearly communicate to us. Specifically, during implementation, their data team worked closely with us to ensure that we were following best practices. They pushed back when they saw issues which was helpful. A really great partner.

What do you dislike about Marigold Engage?
There is some confusion around their legacy product, Campaigns, and their new web-based one, Selligent Marketing Cloud. The documentation for both is housed in the same help center. Sometimes I was reading an article for Campaigns when it should have been SMC. Easy fix. We only have experience with SMC and couldn't be happier.

What problems is Marigold Engage solving and how is that benefiting you?
It is helping us with our 1:1, personalized customer communications.

initial_reviews.review_title: Flexible and powerful platform with fantastic support services
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Marigold Engage?
We found Selligent to be an incredibly flexible solution with a depth of functionality and capabilities. Now we're able to leverage data such as product category, purchase history, purchase affinity and interest levels within our content strategy to dynamically personalize all our communication. The platform allowed us to completely revolutionize our email programs and reach our goal to execute 1:1 marketing - and the investment is already paying off with a significant revenue uptick.

We also consider Selligent's service team to be a true partner for us. I love our account manager. She is always available for our team and supportive of our initiatives and ideas. They not only provide strategic guidance on our campaigns and the use of the platform, but they also go above and beyond to make sure we are successful.

What do you dislike about Marigold Engage?
As with any platform or service, executing a custom, never-before-done, project can take quite a bit of upfront time investment. The tech service team could 've used some work on translating concepts for non-technical audiences.

What problems is Marigold Engage solving and how is that benefiting you?
The Selligent platform allows us to be more efficient in creating complex and sophisticated campaigns that generate higher engagement rates and increased revenue. And, not only does the platform help us achieve our 1:1 marketing goals, but what really stands out to me is the team and the Selligent service support- I know they have my back and for us that is invaluable!

initial_reviews.review_title: Excellent all-around ESP, amazing support, and lots of functionalities
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Marigold Engage?
Selligent provides very capable and user-friendly functionalities as an industry leading ESP. Creating a lifecycle email is very easy with their drag and drop interface. Batch and AB test emails are launched without failure. Their platform connects to our EDS very easily and syncing with an IDS is almost painless (just one minor complaint). Email personalization is very easy to set-up with their Content Block feature (need training to understand at first, but very flexible and useful once understood). Their reporting is straight forward, easy to navigate, and flexible. You have the ability to break your mailing down by device, browser, by day, by week, by month, and by year. Additionally, they provide you with overlay reporting, detailed failure reporting, and you can download the raw data so you can do the analytics yourself in excel or SQL. Lastly, they have an awesome support staff. They are very friendly, responsive, and go above and beyond with helping you trouble-shoot any problems.

What do you dislike about Marigold Engage?
The email template editor can use some work. Doing edits on the fly in the editor can take a lot of time. I suggest using third party websites/software to code your emails and importing the code to the editor.

Dynamic content can be improved with an addition of an IF ELSE statement. Nesting dynamic content logic solves this issue.

Recommendations to others considering Marigold Engage:
Highly recommended because of all the great functionalities and support. More technical users will thrive in this platform as Selligent does a great job with making EDS syncing, targeting, personalization, and executing lifecycle and AB tests very easy. Less technical users will require training.

What problems is Marigold Engage solving and how is that benefiting you?
Sending our Job Alerts and email communication to our list is very easy with Selligent. They take care of the technical work (data storage, IP & reputation monitoring, email validation, etc.) while us marketers can focus on email creation and strategy.

initial_reviews.review_title: Marketer-friendly, great for custom integrations thanks to open API and flexible data model
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Marigold Engage?
It's a rare combination of cloud solution with flexible data setup. It basically allowed us to migrate from previous campaign management platform within weeks. We simply replicated the same data model we used to have for on-premise installation of other vendor. Even having moved to the cloud, we still have an access to SQL console to understand what happens under the bonnet. Very much appreciated by IT guys. On marketing side: friendly GUI, powerful A/B testing and remarkable delivery speed.

What do you dislike about Marigold Engage?
Not 100% HTML5 ready. For agencies like ours, who run their business on Apple computers, there is a small challenge while Selligent requires tiny *.exe component to be installed.

What problems is Marigold Engage solving and how is that benefiting you?
We run a few loyalty programs (some with millions of participants) and we really like how easy it is to convert sometimes complicated business logic into actionable lifecycle campaigns. Having completed data integration trainings at Selligent, we really can dive deep into Selligent system tables to extract data needed to control in-store systems and applications. Really powerful combination.

initial_reviews.review_content:

Selligent is a very robust platform. Great for batch mailings, AB testing and database management.

Reporting is great but still missing certain layers (like drilldown user reports and history). Missing a time graph of mailing engagement from when the campaigns are sent.

I think the platform's strength is in the Lifecycle program. Lots of features and mapping capabilities.

What do you dislike about Marigold Engage?
Can be buggy at times and slow when layering in multiple targets and exclusions at once.

Dynamic content blocks with WYSIWYG capabilities would be helpful.

A lot of the personalization and dynamic capabilities has to use complicated XML,JSON development that is an extra cost.

What problems is Marigold Engage solving and how is that benefiting you?
More personalized 1-1 experience using dynamic LCM programs and logic. Selligent has a great drip feature that lets you visualize the whole experience as complicated as it can be.

all_reviews.review_title: Great Customer Service and Features, but Outdated Message Studio UI
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Marigold Engage?
My organization has been using Selligent's Marketing Cloud services for many years now. We rely on Message Studio to deploy most of our batch and transaction email campaigns. The customer service is great. All users have access to knowledgeable and responsive support through email or phone.

Message Studio also offers unlimited custom email fields unlike some competitors (Twilio Sendgrid).

What do you dislike about Marigold Engage?
The user interface has not been significantly updated in many years. We've also experienced  intermittent issues accessing certain pages and logging into our account.

What problems is Marigold Engage solving and how is that benefiting you?
While we use other enterprise solutions to manage some of our larger volume marketing campaigns, Selligent has been a reliable tool for smaller volume targeted marketing campaigns and their API has enhanced the capabilities of our homegrown CRM.

all_reviews.review_title: Selligent is a cross channel marketing campaign management solution.
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Marigold Engage?
Selligent is a well maintained multichannel tool that provides ideal services for managing marketing campaigns. It tracks online performance, display review sites, provide customizable features, social channels, consulting partnerships and segmentation. Reporting keeps a track of marketing performance, customer, purchase, sales and products by the company which allows ease of approaching the data in a single view. Reporting is very easy to navigate and detailed. Segmentation is also a quality feature. It has great A/B features for email marketing and supports bulk emails efficiently. Message Studio provides very extensive marketing solutions. API platform is a great feature which helps to connect different sevices and other partners. It offers a great platform to connect with customers. Automation really reduces the workload and strengthen the productivity of the company. The customer service is also very quick and responsive. It provides easy scheduling and reusable templates. System is really flexible, relaiable and extremely collaborative. There is no need of any extensive training, its easy to navigate through.

What do you dislike about Marigold Engage?
User interface can be more friendlier. Sometimes it crashes suddenly, needs a good internet connection. Dynamic content takes a lot of time and effort as compare to other competitors in market. There are some functionality limitations in drag and drop features and system also slows down when doing multiple tasks at once. Some features are also a bit difficult to operate.

What problems is Marigold Engage solving and how is that benefiting you?
Selligent is best to use in any kind of large companies. It provides the best channel for email marketing as it can manage large volumes of mails very efficiently. It has very good performance, improves business process outcomes and is also cost effective.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Marigold Engage?
The user-friendly interface helps my team's day-to-day go smoothly. The smart technology allows us to make next-level decisions for audience segmenting and personalization.

What do you dislike about Marigold Engage?
One thing that can be challenging is the limitation with dynamic reporting. When an email is truly dynamic and has several content blocks to support different audience types, we are limited on how much we can drill down into the engagement of each unique send. On the other hand, we have fantastic support from our client relationship manager and technical project managers who always take our feedback to the product team to continue enhancing the capabilities for their users.

What problems is Marigold Engage solving and how is that benefiting you?
Personalization vs. plain old segmentation - this is a problem we are faced with daily. How do we truly personalize on a 1:1 level as opposed to just segmenting by category preference? With the journeys feature and Site, we are able to develop more relevant experiences with true personalization. For example, the ability to capture site behavior in real-time while the person is still shopping. When you have the ability to do this, you can trigger a personalized message either on site or via email with a promotion on that very product the customer was browsing!

all_reviews.review_title: Powerful Email Marketing platform and Great support team
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Marigold Engage?
User interface - Login process is easy. setting up user profiles is very simple on the UI.
Sub organization set up process is simple and well maintained security between organizations.
Email marketing features : Awesome A/B features, dynamic content features
Builk emails - Support large volume emails.
Transaction emails - Support real time trigger emails
Data Integration - Support file imports and direct database connection.
Reports - I like heat map and domain based campaign performance reports
Email editor - Easy to set up simple templates in Selligent for users who dont know HTML coding.
Log files - In case you want to import data back to your in house system then team provides all the logs in details.
Support process - Very experienced and knowledgeable support team and always available for help.
Never had any issues with support team.
Account manager - Always available to help with our account.
LCM - For creating life cycle marketing features based on the customer transactions.
Training - Your marketing agency do not require extensive training. The UI is very simple and easy to learn for any user.

What do you dislike about Marigold Engage?
Segmentation - Limited features for creating complex segment. Examples - If I want to exclude domains that are marked as Invalid in my previous campaign then new records with that domains should be excluded from future campaigns.
Marketing Features - You have to purchase additional license not integrated with enterprise license.
Email preview - It does show email preview and easy to send test emails. But does not have features to see preview based on the devices and browsers. You need to get additional tool.
Ad-hoc reporting - User should have some knowledge on the SQL to build ad-hoc reports.

What problems is Marigold Engage solving and how is that benefiting you?
We feel Selligent is best tool for your email marketing and our previous system we used to encounter issue when we try to launch large volume email campaigns. Delivery rate is depends upon cleansed customer list. If you try to use purchase list then you will end up in delivery issues.
We like A/B testing features in the tool and Template editor.

all_reviews.review_title: Great, feature-rich marketing automation platform with responsive support
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Marigold Engage?
Selligent's user interface for data import and segmentation make it extremely easy for a marketer or technical person to interact with the system. Also - it's consistent across all modules in the Marketing Cloud. A lot of their competitors' feel like a patchwork of different software pieces.

The implementation team and support have are head and shoulders above what we were used to with our old vendor. If we have an issue, they are quick to address it and clearly communicate to us. Specifically, during implementation, their data team worked closely with us to ensure that we were following best practices. They pushed back when they saw issues which was helpful. A really great partner.

What do you dislike about Marigold Engage?
There is some confusion around their legacy product, Campaigns, and their new web-based one, Selligent Marketing Cloud. The documentation for both is housed in the same help center. Sometimes I was reading an article for Campaigns when it should have been SMC. Easy fix. We only have experience with SMC and couldn't be happier.

What problems is Marigold Engage solving and how is that benefiting you?
It is helping us with our 1:1, personalized customer communications.

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about Marigold Engage?
review_question_answers.answer:
Selligent's user interface for data import and segmentation make it extremely easy for a marketer or technical person to interact with the system. Also - it's consistent across all modules in the Marketing Cloud. A lot of their competitors' feel like a patchwork of different software pieces.

The implementation team and support have are head and shoulders above what we were used to with our old vendor. If we have an issue, they are quick to address it and clearly communicate to us. Specifically, during implementation, their data team worked closely with us to ensure that we were following best practices. They pushed back when they saw issues which was helpful. A really great partner.

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about Marigold Engage?
review_question_answers.answer: There is some confusion around their legacy product, Campaigns, and their new web-based one, Selligent Marketing Cloud. The documentation for both is housed in the same help center. Sometimes I was reading an article for Campaigns when it should have been SMC. Easy fix. We only have experience with SMC and couldn't be happier.

all_reviews.review_title: Flexible and powerful platform with fantastic support services
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Marigold Engage?
We found Selligent to be an incredibly flexible solution with a depth of functionality and capabilities. Now we're able to leverage data such as product category, purchase history, purchase affinity and interest levels within our content strategy to dynamically personalize all our communication. The platform allowed us to completely revolutionize our email programs and reach our goal to execute 1:1 marketing - and the investment is already paying off with a significant revenue uptick.

We also consider Selligent's service team to be a true partner for us. I love our account manager. She is always available for our team and supportive of our initiatives and ideas. They not only provide strategic guidance on our campaigns and the use of the platform, but they also go above and beyond to make sure we are successful.

What do you dislike about Marigold Engage?
As with any platform or service, executing a custom, never-before-done, project can take quite a bit of upfront time investment. The tech service team could 've used some work on translating concepts for non-technical audiences.

What problems is Marigold Engage solving and how is that benefiting you?
The Selligent platform allows us to be more efficient in creating complex and sophisticated campaigns that generate higher engagement rates and increased revenue. And, not only does the platform help us achieve our 1:1 marketing goals, but what really stands out to me is the team and the Selligent service support- I know they have my back and for us that is invaluable!

all_reviews.review_title: Excellent all-around ESP, amazing support, and lots of functionalities
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Marigold Engage?
Selligent provides very capable and user-friendly functionalities as an industry leading ESP. Creating a lifecycle email is very easy with their drag and drop interface. Batch and AB test emails are launched without failure. Their platform connects to our EDS very easily and syncing with an IDS is almost painless (just one minor complaint). Email personalization is very easy to set-up with their Content Block feature (need training to understand at first, but very flexible and useful once understood). Their reporting is straight forward, easy to navigate, and flexible. You have the ability to break your mailing down by device, browser, by day, by week, by month, and by year. Additionally, they provide you with overlay reporting, detailed failure reporting, and you can download the raw data so you can do the analytics yourself in excel or SQL. Lastly, they have an awesome support staff. They are very friendly, responsive, and go above and beyond with helping you trouble-shoot any problems.

What do you dislike about Marigold Engage?
The email template editor can use some work. Doing edits on the fly in the editor can take a lot of time. I suggest using third party websites/software to code your emails and importing the code to the editor.

Dynamic content can be improved with an addition of an IF ELSE statement. Nesting dynamic content logic solves this issue.

Recommendations to others considering Marigold Engage:
Highly recommended because of all the great functionalities and support. More technical users will thrive in this platform as Selligent does a great job with making EDS syncing, targeting, personalization, and executing lifecycle and AB tests very easy. Less technical users will require training.

What problems is Marigold Engage solving and how is that benefiting you?
Sending our Job Alerts and email communication to our list is very easy with Selligent. They take care of the technical work (data storage, IP & reputation monitoring, email validation, etc.) while us marketers can focus on email creation and strategy.

all_reviews.review_title: Marketer-friendly, great for custom integrations thanks to open API and flexible data model
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Marigold Engage?
It's a rare combination of cloud solution with flexible data setup. It basically allowed us to migrate from previous campaign management platform within weeks. We simply replicated the same data model we used to have for on-premise installation of other vendor. Even having moved to the cloud, we still have an access to SQL console to understand what happens under the bonnet. Very much appreciated by IT guys. On marketing side: friendly GUI, powerful A/B testing and remarkable delivery speed.

What do you dislike about Marigold Engage?
Not 100% HTML5 ready. For agencies like ours, who run their business on Apple computers, there is a small challenge while Selligent requires tiny *.exe component to be installed.

What problems is Marigold Engage solving and how is that benefiting you?
We run a few loyalty programs (some with millions of participants) and we really like how easy it is to convert sometimes complicated business logic into actionable lifecycle campaigns. Having completed data integration trainings at Selligent, we really can dive deep into Selligent system tables to extract data needed to control in-store systems and applications. Really powerful combination.

Selligent is a very robust platform. Great for batch mailings, AB testing and database management.

Reporting is great but still missing certain layers (like drilldown user reports and history). Missing a time graph of mailing engagement from when the campaigns are sent.

I think the platform's strength is in the Lifecycle program. Lots of features and mapping capabilities.

What do you dislike about Marigold Engage?
Can be buggy at times and slow when layering in multiple targets and exclusions at once.

Dynamic content blocks with WYSIWYG capabilities would be helpful.

A lot of the personalization and dynamic capabilities has to use complicated XML,JSON development that is an extra cost.

What problems is Marigold Engage solving and how is that benefiting you?
More personalized 1-1 experience using dynamic LCM programs and logic. Selligent has a great drip feature that lets you visualize the whole experience as complicated as it can be.

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about Marigold Engage?
review_question_answers.answer: Das Tool ist sehr nutzerfreundlich und leicht zu bedienen. Es bietet viele Funktionalitaten, die zusatzlich nutzbar waren. Guter Kundenservice - auch das Onboarding funktionierte reibungslos, unsere Ansprechpartner waren sehr hilfsbereit und standen fur Fragen stets zur Verfugung.

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about Marigold Engage?
review_question_answers.answer: Die Template-Erstellung im Editor ist relativ aufwendig und braucht definitiv Ubung - daher nutzen wir meist die Moglichkeit des Versandes mit dem Express-Template. Das ist wiederum sehr einfach, bietet aber auch weniger Flexibilitat in der Gestaltung.

review_question_answers.question: What problems is Marigold Engage solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: Newsletter-Versand fur Kunden und Interessenten, gezielte Kundenansprache durch verschiedene Targeting-Listen

all_reviews.review_title: Alright...but not wow.
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Marigold Engage?
I like the service rep that we have. He's awesome!

What do you dislike about Marigold Engage?
I dislike that Selligent is not updating our platform any longer. I also dislike that their back end doesn't play well with our back end. That isn't entirely their fault.

Recommendations to others considering Marigold Engage:
Spring for the program that is being updated.

What problems is Marigold Engage solving and how is that benefiting you?
We launch successful batch and blast email campaigns.

all_reviews.review_title: Great tool once you learn how to use it properly.
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Marigold Engage?
The open API platform (which is native to Selligent) is great for connecting partners and other services.

What do you dislike about Marigold Engage?
Each additional component of the tool is an "add-on" where is should be available from the start.

What problems is Marigold Engage solving and how is that benefiting you?
Having an open API platform helps us connect to programs and platforms which we'd normally have a flat-file or some type of manual load. Message Studio takes that out of the equation.

all_reviews.review_title: Strong Marketing Platform
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Marigold Engage?
Selligent is a very efficient platform for sending large volumes of email marketing campaigns quickly.  Their support is responsive, they promote proactive deliverability support and work with our marketing teams to implement new programs and ideas.

What do you dislike about Marigold Engage?
As is the case with many marketing platforms, data integration can sometimes be daunting and slow.  In the day and age of data driven marketing platforms a tighter integration with our internal systems would be beneficial.

Recommendations to others considering Marigold Engage:
Very solid platform, easy integration, strong support

What problems is Marigold Engage solving and how is that benefiting you?
We use Selligent for email deployment and customer targeting.

Easy to use. Does require technical expertise to setup correctly. Lots of data available on performance.

What do you dislike about Marigold Engage?
Requires technical expertise to tweak settings.

What problems is Marigold Engage solving and how is that benefiting you?
Sending emails to subscriber lists. Easily distributes weekly and adhoc email communications to a wide audience.
